description:
html: properly close <marquee> elements.

Pass tests1.dat, test 80:
<a href=a>aa<marquee>aa<a href=b>bb</marquee>aa

| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <a>
|       href="a"
|       "aa"
|       <marquee>
|         "aa"
|         <a>
|           href="b"
|           "bb"
|       "aa"

Also pass tests through test 82:
<!DOCTYPE html><spacer>foo

messages.text:
